turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello there, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I want to place a Starbucks order for the Starbucks on Northern Boulevard in Bayside, New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I wanted to get a grande black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk do you want in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk is okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also, can you add whipped cream and syrup on top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of syrup did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: chocolate.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said you wanted a grande black and white mocha with whole milk and whipped cream and chocolate syrup from starbucks on northern boulevard in new york.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total will be $4.50. Should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been placed. It'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins. The receipt has been sent to your phone. Do you need anything else from me.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too.
